    • Constructor Detail

      • Map

        public Map(int level,
           Game game)
        Construtor for instantiating a new Map in a new game.
        Parameters:
        level - Which level you want to load.
        game - Corresponding game.

      • Map

        public Map(java.lang.String save,
           Game game)
        Constructor for creating a saved game map.
        Parameters:
        save - Formated String with all the information obtained from the database.
        game - Corresponding game.

      • Map

        public Map(java.lang.String m)
        Constructor for a map in a multiplayer game.
        Parameters:
        m - Formated String containing the multiplayer map.

    • Method Detail

      • render

        public void render(int xScroll,
                   int yScroll,
                   Screen screen)
        Method to render the map. The map is rendered according to the given coordinates and screen size.
        Parameters:
        xScroll - X coordinate to start rendering the map.
        yScroll - Y coordinate to start rendering the map.
        screen - Screen in which the map will be rendered.

      • getTile

        public Tile getTile(int x,
                    int y)
        ´Get tile in the given coordinates. If coordinates out of bounds, return void tile to avoid out of bounds exception.
        Parameters:
        x - X coordinate to get tile.
        y - Y coordinate to get tile.
        Returns:
        Tile in the given coordinates.

      • setTile

        public void setTile(int x,
                    int y,
                    char c)
        Set tile in the tiles array, where the main running map is stored.
        Parameters:
        x - X coordinate of tile to add.
        y - Y coordinate of tile to add.
        c - Character of the tile to add.
